long_description: Designed for your comfort and leisure while on the go, the Electra Townie 7D step-through women's bike offers a range of gears so your riding stays smooth and simple, and having fun is a sure thing. Flat Foot Technology(TM) geometry places rider upright for comfortable, heads-up positioning; aft positioning allows a rider to place both feet on the ground at a stop. The result is a low center of gravity, full leg extension and increased comfort-somewhat similar to the recumbent bike at your gym. Ergonomic saddle with elastomer bumpers offers a comfortable, shock-absorbent ride. Shimano Revo shifter and rear derailleur provide smooth shifting through 7 gears. Linear-pull brakes provide controlled deceleration for easy stopping. Semi-slick 26x2.0 tires ensure a smooth and stable ride over a variety of road or gravel surfaces. Platform pedals deliver total convenience-no special shoes required. One size fits most. Specs are subject to change.
